Introduction

Park Seong Yeon (박성연) is a South Korean solo trot singer and model under Big Game Entertainment. She made her debut with the digital single album "Peach" on October 20, 2018.

In February 2019, she joined the competitive survival reality show Miss Trot and won, earning her a place in the trot-pop girl group Venus that debuted on August 6, 2019.

On June 27, 2021, she debuted as a member of the trio OUTLET with their first digital single "You Make Me Crazy".
